title: CDL Class A Driver SOLO OR TEAM
full_description: We are seeking a CDL Class A Driver to join our team! You will be responsible for safely operating a truck Dedicated Lane Phoenix Az to Dallas TX AND FL ,GA ,NC,Responsibilities:Safely operate a heavy or tractor-trailer truckNo Touch FreightProperly track and document activity logReport any issues or incidents to dispatchInspect truck before and after tripMinimum 2 Year ExperienceQualifications:Previous experience in truck driving or other related fieldsCommercial driver's licenseAbility to handle physical workloadStrong work ethic
